a.n: Desire Fantasy: Red Light Arena Scene 3

p.k: Abandoning her life as an influencer, "Kitty" (Janice Griffith) moves away from the city and into a secluded mansion with her sugar daddy, "Sir" (Michael Vegas). But what good is a lavish life to an e-girl who can't post it online? Disconnected from the outside world, Kitty grows captive by her sponsor's no-device policy and frustrated with his secrets.
